name: Motion Primitives
description: Open-source UI kit of Framer Motion primitives for building beautiful, animated interfaces quickly with React and Tailwind CSS.

licensing.notes: Core primitives are free under MIT; some advanced components and templates require Motion Primitives Pro.

components.name: motion-box
components.description: Convenience wrapper around motion.div with sensible defaults that works with any Tailwind layout.

initial.description: Initial animation state passed to Framer Motion.

animate.description: Target animation state when component is mounted or active.

exit.description: Exit animation state used with AnimatePresence.

transition.description: Framer Motion transition config (duration, ease, type, etc.).

className.description: Tailwind utility classes for styling the element.

examples.title: Fade In
examples.code:
<MotionBox
  initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
  animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
  transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
  className="rounded-xl bg-card p-6 shadow"
>
  Content
</MotionBox>

components.name: draggable
components.description: Makes any child draggable with optional axis and constraints, using Framer Motion drag.

axis.description: Limits drag to the x-axis, y-axis, or both.

constraints.description: Drag constraints passed through to the Motion component.

className.description: Tailwind classes for the draggable wrapper.

examples.title: Draggable Card
examples.code: Drag me horizontally

components.name: hover-lift
components.description: Adds a subtle scale, translate and shadow on hover using whileHover under the hood.

lift.description: Vertical translate in pixels on hover.

transition.description: Optional custom transition for the hover effect.

examples.title: Hover Card
examples.code: Hover me

components.name: pressable
components.description: Adds press/tap feedback via scale animation using whileTap.

scale.description: Scale applied while the element is pressed or tapped.

transition.description: Optional transition override for press animation.

examples.title: Pressable Button
examples.code:
<Pressable>
  <button className="rounded-md bg-primary px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-primary-foreground">
    Click me
  </button>
</Pressable>

components.name: scroll-reveal
components.description: Reveals content when it scrolls into view using whileInView and viewport options.

offset.description: Fraction of viewport height before triggering reveal.

initial.description: Initial state before the section is in view.

animate.description: Target state once the section has entered the viewport.

once.description: Whether the reveal should only happen once.

examples.title: Section Reveal
examples.code:
Scroll into view

This section animates as it appears.

components.useCase: Revealing element when scrolled into view.

components.name: parallax-layer
components.description: Parallax layer that moves at a different speed than scroll, ideal for hero backgrounds.

speed.description: Scroll speed multiplier; negative values move opposite the scroll.

className.description: Tailwind classes for the parallax layer container.

examples.title: Parallax Background
examples.code: Parallax Hero

components.useCase: Layer moving at different speed for parallax.

components.name: stagger-container
components.description: Parent container that staggers children animations using Framer Motion variants.

delay.description: Delay between each child animation in seconds.

components.name: presence
components.description: Thin wrapper around AnimatePresence for handling exit animations of conditional content.

mode.description: AnimatePresence mode controlling how exiting/entering elements are coordinated.

examples.title: Conditional Modal
examples.code:
{open && (
Modal content
 )}

components.useCase: Handling exit animations for unmounting components.

components.name: cursor-follow
components.description: Element that smoothly follows the cursor with spring physics for custom cursors or highlights.

className.description: Tailwind classes for the follower element.

stiffness.description: Spring stiffness for the follower motion.

damping.description: Spring damping for the follower motion.

examples.title: Custom Cursor
examples.code: <CursorFollow className="pointer-events-none h-6 w-6 rounded-full bg-primary/60 mix-blend-screen" />

components.name: motion-stack
components.description: Stacked list with enter/exit animations built on AnimatePresence; ideal for toasts or notifications.

items.description: Array of items to render in the stack.

renderItem.description: Render function that receives an item and returns a MotionBox or animated element.

examples.title: Animated Notifications
examples.code:
<MotionStack
  items={notifications}
  renderItem={(n) => (
    <MotionBox
      key={n.id}
      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 8 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 8 }}
      className="rounded-md bg-card p-3 text-sm shadow"
    >
      {n.message}
    </MotionBox>
  )}
/>

components.useCase: Stack of items with entrance/exit animations.
